page.title: 11 A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My radio alarm wakes me to North Sound.I get up at 7:30am,get dressed and go for my breakfast.I watch TV for a while then get my school bag and my play piece ready.I leave for school at 8:30 and kiss mum.Dad works one week offshore for Britoil on Beatrice Alpha in the North Sea then he's home for a week.When he's at home he goes down to the Fire Station to check and clean things.He is one of 10 part-time fire men.There is one fire engine,a pump water tender,callsign Echo721.His most unusual call out has been to take a calf out of a well.On my way to school I call for Chris and we walk up to school and play a game of football before the bell rings. After school I get 20p for sweets and change into my play clothes.I go in for my supper at 6:oopm then mum helps me with my home work.I watch TV and go to bed at 9:00
